SEARCH

Package se.swedenconnect.security.credential.opensaml

package se.swedenconnect.security.credential.opensaml
Credentials defined for use with OpenSAML/Shibboleth. Requires explicit inclusion of the opensaml-security-api dependency.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    se.swedenconnect.security.credential
    Generic support for X.509 credentials.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    OpenSamlCredential
    A credential that implements OpenSAML's X509Credential interface and wraps a PkiCredential.
    OpenSamlCredentialTransformerFunction
    Function that transform a PkiCredential into an OpenSAML X509Credential.
    OpenSamlCredentialTransformerFunction.DefaultEntityIdFunction
    Default implementation of the function getting the SAML entityID to assign.
    OpenSamlMetadataProperties
    Symbolic constants for storing OpenSAML specific properties in a PkiCredential.Metadata object.
